description: Grade 9 / Junior High Year 3 (Targeting Full Score in Suzhou Zhongkao)
curriculum_standard: Based on 2022 National Curriculum Standards (3 Major Themes, 24 Sub-topics)

topic_coverage.summary: Comprehensive coverage of Man & Self, Man & Society, and Man & Nature.

categories.name: Category 1: Man & Self (Personal Growth & Lifestyle)
sub_topics: Healthy Living (Physical & Mental Health, Dealing with Stress/Anxiety)
Learning Efficiency (Study Habits, Time Management, The 'Double Reduction' Policy)
Personal Interests (Hobbies, Reading, Music, Sports)
Self-awareness (Strengths/Weaknesses, Future Plans/Dream Job)
example_prompts: My Plan for the Coming Senior High School Life
A Good Habit That Helps Me Learn

categories.name: Category 2: Man & Society (Social Responsibility & Interaction)
sub_topics: Interpersonal Relationships (Family, Teachers, Friends, Resolving Conflicts)
Community Service (Volunteering, Helping the Elderly, Charity Sales)
Social Etiquette & Rules (Public Behavior, Following Traffic Rules)
Safety Education (Self-protection, Internet Safety)
example_prompts: How to Get Along with Parents

categories.name: Category 3: Traditional Culture & Local Pride (Suzhou Context)
sub_topics: Chinese Festivals & Customs (Spring Festival, Mid-Autumn Festival)
Introducing Hometown (Suzhou Gardens, Kunqu Opera, Local Food, Silk)
Great People (Famous Chinese Historical Figures/Scientists)
Cultural Confidence (Why we should love our traditional culture)
example_prompts: Introducing Suzhou to a Foreign Friend

categories.name: Category 4: Man & Nature (Environment & Science)
sub_topics: Environmental Protection (Garbage Sorting, Low-carbon Life, Protecting Taihu Lake)
Science & Technology (AI in Daily Life, Space Exploration, Smart Phones)
Human & Animals (Protecting Wild Animals, Pets)
example_prompts: Life with AI: Convenience or Challenge?

categories.name: Category 5: Values & Morality
sub_topics: Virtues (Honesty, Kindness, Courage, Perseverance)
Role Models (People who move China, Everyday Heroes)
Labor Education (Housework, School Cleaning, Farming Experience)

categories.name: Category 6: New Question Types (Recent Trends)
sub_topics: Practical Writing (Notice, Letter of Invitation, Application Letter)
Graph/Chart Analysis (Describing data trends and giving opinions)
Reading & Writing (Summarizing a passage + Expressing personal views - *2024 Trend*)

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 1800-2000 words, focusing on topic-specific verbs and adjectives.

complex_structures: Object Clauses (I think that... / He asked if...)
Passive Voice (is done / was done / can be done)
It is + adj. + for sb. + to do sth.
V-ing as Subject/Object (Reading is distinct from...)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Use of 'Not only... but also...', 'Neither... nor...', 'Too... to...', 'So... that...'

writing_standards.cohesion: Mandatory use of transition words: Firstly, Secondly, Furthermore, However, Therefore, In a word.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Clear logic, rich vocabulary, correct grammar, and neat handwriting.
